modName: Recoloured trees and improved LOD trees
summary: Put some more colour on aspen trees and pine trees
descriptionHtml:
Recoloured trees and improved LOD trees

This mod gives a little bit more colour to pine trees and a lot more colour to the aspen trees.
The textures are based on the original textures and have the same size, however I had to add some textures to create the colour variance. This might influence your framerate, or might not at all, in my case at least it doesn't.

The LOD tree textures are modified as well, same way as in my other mod.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6245

I know I'm not the first one creating a tree mod, anyway give it a try if you like the screenshots.

This mod is probably not compatible with most other tree mods, so be careful.

Cheers!

--Changelog--
v0.763
-changed pine tree colours to much darker tones
-reduces colour variation of pine trees from 5 to 2


--Installation/Deinstallation--
Just unpack the file into your Skyrim\data directory.

If you don't like it, just delete the file.

--To-Do--
Maybe I recolour the rest of the trees...or maybe not ;)
author: Prime8King
